summary: This is a calendar entry for the arraignment of Ghislaine Maxwell on the S2 indictment, scheduled for April 23, 2021, at the 500 Pearl Street courthouse. It details the time, location, and a reminder alarm.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the arraignment event listed on the calendar; she is to be arraigned on the S2 indictment.

events.title: Maxwell Arraignment on S2 Indictment
events.description: Scheduled arraignment proceeding for Ghislaine Maxwell concerning the S2 indictment.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's arraignment on the S2 indictment was scheduled for April 23, 2021, at 6:30 PM.
The proceeding was to be held at 500 Pearl Street, Courtroom 24B.
The calendar entry was created and modified on April 8, 2021, indicating administrative planning for the court event.
